basics.name: Tiffany Young
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.B.A. in Management Information Systems at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall 2023.

courses: ITM 353 - Info Systems Analysis and Design

highlights: Assist users in the computer lab with technical issues.
Perform routine cleaning and updating to ensure the performance of the computer systems.
Maintain documentation of technical issues that arise in the lab andactions taken.
Greet visitors at reception and serve as the first point of contact and process their credentials for access to the building.
Provide excellent customer service while in a fast-paced and high stress environment.
Balance many responsibilities including answering phone calls, packing orders, serving tables, and hosting while maintaining a professional disposition.
Work closely with others as a team to create a unique and memorable experience.

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
highlights: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
